description.en: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.ar: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.br: Este item permite que você grite uma única mensagem em todos os canais. Você não é necessário ser nível 20 para usá-lo.
description.cns: 此物品允许您向所有频道发送一条全局消息，所有频道的人都将看到。 您无需达到 20 级即可使用它。
description.de: Dieser Gegenstand ermöglicht es dir eine einzelne Nachricht an alle Kanäle des Servers zu senden.
description.fi: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.fil: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.fr: Cet item vous permet de crier un seul message sur tous les canaux. Vous n'avez pas besoin d'être niveau 20 pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Item ini memungkinkan Anda untuk meneriakkan satu pesan di semua saluran. Anda tidak perlu menjadi level 20 untuk menggunakannya.
description.it: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.jp: このアイテムを使用すると、すべてのチャンネルで1回シャウトすることができます。使用するのにレベル20である必要はありません。
description.kr: 이 항목을 사용하면 모든 채널들로 하나의 메시지를 외칠 수 있습니다. 20레벨이 아니어도 사용할 수 있습니다.
description.nl: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.pl: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.ru: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.sp: Este objeto te permite mandar un único Grito por todos los canales. No necesitas ser nivel 20 para usarlo.
description.sw: This item allows you to shout a single message across all channels. You don't need to be level 20 to use it.
description.th: รายการนี้ให้คุณตะโกนข้อความเดียวในทุกช่องทาง คุณไม่จำเป็นต้องมีเลเวล 20 เพื่อใช้งาน
description.tw: 可讓你傳送一則訊息到所有伺服器，不需等級限制。您無需達到 20 級即可使用它。
description.vi: Mục này cho phép bạn truyền tải một thông điệp trên tất cả các kênh. Bạn không cần phải là cấp 20 để sử dụng nó.
